title: Centre for European Reform
author: unknown
source: The Centre for European Reform is an award winning independent think-tank devoted to making the EU work better, and strengthening its role in the world. We are pro-European but not uncritical.
text:
CER/HSF hybrid discussion on 'Von der Leyen's second term: What future for the European Commission?' 09 December 2024 

   Hybrid London/Zoom 
   With Marco Buti and Catherine Day. Watch the video of the event here.

   Hybrid Brussels/Zoom 
   With Aslak Berg, Elisabetta Cornago, Pedro Gazzinelli Colares and Vicente Hurtado Roa
